testcase.name: check service url
testcase.system-out: * def metadata = read('metadata.Service.json') ............................ passed * print metadata .......................................................... passed * print "testing url:" + metadata.url ..................................... passed Given url metadata.url .................................................... passed When method HEAD .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match responseHeaders['Content-Length'][0] == '#notnull' .............. passed And match responseHeaders['Content-Type'][0] == 'text/xml' ................ passed And def filesize = responseHeaders['Content-Length'][0] .................. passed * assert filesize > 2000 .................................................. passed
